Text.Page: Nagas and undead seem a strange alliance, don't you agree? It's a mystery I'd love to unravel. Would you be willing to hunt some {@LinkCreature:42#600#skeletal watchers} and see if you can find any evidence on them?

A stone that controls the undead. Hmmm, I've heard about that somewhere before...

Something to do with Thulsa, I think.

Great job. This is important information.
Have you gone after the {@LinkCreature:42#600#skeletal defenders} yet? We need proof they're working for the nagas.
